effect.en: Search your deck for an Item card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.
effect.pt: Search your deck for an Item card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

description.en: Pikachu that can generate powerful electricity have cheek sacs that are extra soft and super stretchy.

illustrator: Illus. & Direc. The Pokémon Company Art Team
